name: U-Official
trait: Does not attack but continuously restores the HP of all allies within range (the HP restored per second is equal to 10% of self ATK). This unit is unaffected by Inspire, and ignores the Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time.

talent.name: Short-Circuiting Genius
talent.desc: Less likely to be attacked; After being deployed for a certain duration, Stun other units within range for 7.5 seconds

base skill: When this Operator is assigned to a Trading Post, order acquisition efficiency +10%, but all Pure Gold orders in that Trading Post will only trade 2 Pure Gold (not considered as defaulted trade)
When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, increases the likelihood of obtaining clues that are already on the Clue Board.
